core:outcomeLink.core:comment: If the server has more than 3 response queues held, so is presumably busy, we will wait for a short time before retrying.

core:executeProcessAction.core:comment: Call out to supplied ProcessId to create or modify the Authorisation Request Message. The called process must output an Authorisation Request Message. Input parameters are optional and their meaning depends on the callled process.

core:action.core:comment: Increment Eft Message Number, once request is successfully sent to host (and not for retries).
Increment Eft Message Number, once request is successfully sent to host (and not for retries).

core:assignAction.core:comment: Original message got a server assigned tid. We must reverse using the same tid etc.
If we are non-interactive, set a dummy prompt url. This overrides the normal url for all the prompt states

core:promptState.core:comment: Prompt displayed while awaiting authorisation. Its timeout determines the maximum time to wait.
Prompt displayed while awaiting authorisation. Its timeout determines the maximum time to wait.
